author: Special Correspondent
text:
A unit of Saint Gobain India commissioned on the premises of SIPCOT Industrial Growth Centre at Perundurai by Chief Minister Jayalalithaa through video-conferencing provides employment to 390 persons.

The Rs. 300 crore facility has been established on a 35-acre site in the Special Economic Zone. The unit, official sources said, has two production lines. While the first was established earlier, the second was readied after the Global Investors Meet.

New production facilities have been established by the company in different parts of the State at an overall investment of Rs. 3,636 crore.

It includes the Rs. 250 crore Research Centre at Taramani providing employment to 110 persons.
title: Unit commissioned
